entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:46 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain this evening then to periods of snow before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight then northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
